home.hero: Comfy. Water Resistant. Unisex. Made with 96% Recycled and Natural Materials.
home.socially: Socially and Environmentally Progressive Outdoor Footwear.
home.madeOf1: The Weekend Boot Thesus outdoor footwear is made from tough recycled nylon and natural rubber. They are versatile, comfy, durable and made with environmentally and socially progressive materials.
home.madeOf2: Each pair diverts 1-2 Kg of waste from waterways and landfill, reduces 20 Kg of CO2 and conserves 10 L of water compared to your traditional leather boot.
home.stayInTouch: Let's stay in touch. Get {{val, currency(USD)}} off your first purchase, early access to new releases and outdoor tips, trips and education.

store.storeClogsHeroSub: Made with 99% natural and recycled materials.
